summary: REQ-24 and REQ-25 appear to be implemented in PawfectCareLanding.tsx via use of SafeImage and publicAssetUrl, with the landing page described as having exactly three “Happy Pets, Happy Hearts” images and the Bath & Brush card using image-20.png. However, the diff summary does not provide concrete evidence that the CSS duplication/conflict between frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css was resolved as required (REQ-23), nor can it verify a rebuild/deploy (REQ-26).

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the production styling issue (black-and-white appearance) by ensuring the intended Chewy-blue Tailwind theme variables are applied at runtime and not overridden by conflicting/duplicate theme stylesheets (notably resolve any conflict between frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css).
missing_requirements.reason: While frontend/index.css is modified, the diff summary provides no direct evidence that duplicate/conflicting theme token definitions across frontend/index.css and frontend/src/index.css were removed/merged, or that runtime stylesheet loading was adjusted to ensure only one authoritative set of CSS variables applies in production.

missing_requirements.requirement: Rebuild and deploy the updated Pawfect Care Draft Version 2 frontend so the live production deployment includes the restored Chewy-blue colors and specified image updates.
missing_requirements.reason: Deployment/rebuild actions and live production state are not verifiable from the provided code diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update describing rebuild/deploy in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requirements focus on theme color restoration and specific image changes; updating internal project state/versioning is not explicitly requested as part of the implementation requirements.
